profile.name: Frieze Kere Wandabwa
profile.title: Head of IT | IT Governance | Infrastructure & Digital Transformation

summary: Strategic IT Leader with over eight years of progressive experience directing IT governance, infrastructure operations, cybersecurity, and service management across multi-site environments. Proven ability to execute IT strategy aligned to business objectives, strengthen data protection and compliance frameworks, optimize multi-million KES IT budgets, and lead distributed technical teams delivering secure, high-availability systems. Experienced in supporting enterprise operations for global organizations including DHL, AWS, Cisco, and the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. Recognized for driving operational excellence, mitigating risk, and enabling scalable digital transformation initiatives.
executiveScale: 8+ Years IT Leadership  ·  15 Multi-Site Centers  ·  15+ Engineers Led  ·  Multi-Million KES Budget Oversight

achievements.text: Directed IT operations across 15 multi-site centers spanning multiple countries, ensuring secure, resilient infrastructure environments for global enterprise clients including DHL, AWS, and Cisco.
Governed IT service management processes strictly aligned to ITIL 4 standards, driving a 40% reduction in incident resolution time while significantly increasing service quality benchmarks.

Strengthened organizational data protection frameworks by implementing rigorous access governance, endpoint security protocols, and risk mitigation controls, decreasing identified vulnerabilities by 30%.
Maintained 99.9% system uptime for critical network, collaboration, and AV platforms supporting multinational stakeholders and high-value project delivery requirements.
Orchestrated multi-million KES IT budget planning and resource allocation across the multi-site portfolio, achieving 20% cost efficiency through rigorous expenditure governance.
Negotiated complex vendor and OEM service agreements, ensuring 100% SLA compliance while strengthening procurement accountability and strategic partnership value.

Spearheaded secure digital onboarding for Tier-1 global clients (Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation) by designing infrastructure, connectivity, and compliance-ready environments tailored to regulatory needs.
Established enterprise governance dashboards and executive reporting frameworks, providing senior leadership with real-time visibility into IT performance, risk posture, and investment ROI.
Implemented comprehensive disaster recovery and business continuity frameworks, mitigating operational risk and ensuring rapid service restoration capabilities across geographically dispersed sites.
Oversaw the strategic rollout of regional IT and network infrastructure programs across 500+ sites, ensuring seamless alignment with national connectivity targets.
Directed multi-million KES infrastructure budgets, enforcing stringent financial controls, procurement governance, and resource optimization across regional projects.
Lead-negotiated high-value contracts with Huawei, Nokia, Cisco, and Ericsson, optimizing procurement costs and strengthening vendor SLA performance by 25%.
Deployed structured project governance frameworks that enhanced stakeholder visibility, optimized delivery timelines, and reduced operational execution delays by 15%.
Standardized regional compliance with ISO and occupational safety standards (OHS), effectively mitigating regulatory risks and improving safety audit performance.
Led and mentored a cross-functional regional engineering team of 15+, establishing performance tracking mechanisms that increased workforce productivity by 20%.
Introduced centralized monitoring and reporting toolsets, shifting infrastructure management from reactive to proactive, resulting in a 30% reduction in critical faults.
Strengthened regional network resilience through strategic redundancy planning and structured risk mitigation for large-scale telecom deployments.
Managed regulatory ICT operations within a national governance environment, supporting information security management system (ISMS) initiatives for ISO 27001 compliance.
Architected and implemented a digital records management framework for over 50,000 regulatory assets, significantly improving audit readiness and operational transparency.
Strengthened data governance and information handling procedures across national regulatory operations, ensuring high standards of integrity and security.
Contributed to national compliance reporting and regulatory enforcement support activities, aligning IT support with ICT licensing regulations.
Maintained ICT infrastructure within a high-compliance aviation security environment, ensuring the availability of critical communication and surveillance systems.
Performed structured preventive maintenance and rigorous technical documentation in support of aviation safety and international regulatory audits.
